rukus.text: Falao de baixing zhong de zhong lingxiu shuo:“Zhe que shi yige gaoming de shushi
ta xiang ping ta de moshu, ba nimen zhu chu guojing, nimen you she me jianyi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Qing ni kuanrong ta he ta di gege, bing pai zhaomu yuan wang ge chengshi qu
tamen hui ba suoyou gaoming de shushi dou zhao dao ni de yuqian lai.”
Shushimen lai jian falao, tamen shuo:“Ruguo women huosheng, women hui dedao baochou ma?”
Ta shuo:“Shi de, nimen biding shuyu qinxin zhi lie.”
Tamen shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni xian pao (ni de shouzhang) ne, haishi women xian pao (women de) ne?”
Ta shuo:“Nimen xian pao ba! Dang tamen pao xiaqu shi,(bian chu de dongxi) xuanhuole zhongren de yanjing, erqie shi renmen kongbu. Tamen shizhanle da moshu
wo qishi mu sa shuo:“Ni pao chu ni de shouzhang ba.” Yushi, na tiao shouzhang like xiaomiele tamen suo huanhua de (dongxi)
Yushi, zhenli zhaozhu, er tamen suo yan de moshu bian cheng wuyong de
Falao deng dangchang baibei, yi bian er chengwei quru zhe
Shushimen bu youji de baidao xiaqu
tamen shuo:“Women yi xinyang zhong shijie de zhu
ji mu sa he ha lun de zhu.”
Falao shuo:“Meiyou huode wo de xuke, nimen zenme jiu xinyangle ta ne? Zhe yiding shi nimen zai cheng li yumou de, xiang jie ci ba cheng li de jumin quzhu chuqu; bujiu nimen jiu hui zhidaole
Wo yiding yao jiaohuzhe kan diao nimen shoujiao, ranhou, wo biding ba nimen tongtong ding si zai shizijia shang.”
Tamen shuo:“Women que yao fan yu women de zhu
Ni wufei shi zebei women xinyangle women de zhu suo jiang shi de jixiang. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni ba jianren qingzhu zai women de xinzhong, qiu ni zai women shunfu de qingzhuang xia shi women siqu.”
